summary: Experienced software developer specializing in high-intensity projects in the banking industry, skilled in both senior and leading roles. Proficient in Python, JavaScript, and leading teams to deliver robust solutions. Skilled at engaging in all stages of product development, from conception to delivery, with a strong focus on user needs.
hard_skills: Languages: Python (>10 years), JavaScript (>10 years), Ruby (2 years) and also bash, sql, ...
Frameworks: Django, Flask, Express, Next.js, Rails, Angular, ReactJS, VueJS, Ember, Knockout, JQuery, ...
Data Management: Databricks, MS SQL Server, Oracle SQL Developer, MongoDB, PostgreSQL
Tools and Platforms: Databricks, AWS, Git, Subversion, Heroku, Digital Ocean, IBM BlueMix, CI tools (Travis, CircleCI)
Testing and Automation: Jasmine, Karma, Protractor, Python unittest, Grunt JS
Data Visualization: D3.js, nvd3, Tableau, PowerBI
Mobile Development: React Native, NativeScript, Android Studio, Cordova for hybrid mobile builds

software_experience.project_name: CAP2 / One Gate at National Bank of Belgium
software_experience.description: Implemented data transition from legacy databases into Databricks and implemented data pipelines and products

software_experience.project_name: SBSP at National Bank of Belgium
software_experience.description: Created web apis for data aggregation queries and risk models indicators on securities portfolios

software_experience.project_name: Cash 2 Project at National Bank of Belgium
software_experience.description: Led the frontend development team for a major banking project spanning 11 countries. Managed upgrades to technologies, architecture, and developed libraries used in multiple projects.

software_experience.project_name: Tableau API Extension at Cronos Group
software_experience.description: Developed a Tableau Software extension, using reverse engineering for Tableau APIs (Dataviz) to enhance user experience.

Built various web and mobile applications using Django Rest Framework for backend, and Angular for frontend. Developed real-time chat and notification systems. Photo and filesystem management and collaboration.

responsibilities: Launched sales and logistics operations in France for non-woven fabrics.
Direct management of 200+ active B2B clients.
Coordinated strategic zone marketing for LATAM professional products division.
Supported budgeting and marketing development for REDKEN and MATRIX brands.
Managed operational marketing for top wine brands.
Prepared marketing plans for major brands such as Esporao and Quinta da Aveleda.

academic_background.institution: Prague University of Economics & Nova School of Business & Economics

personal_interests: Hiking: Passionate about adventurous exploration, challenging trails, nature immersion, and wilderness camping.
Sports: Enjoy tennis, surfing, HIIT, running, and obstacle courses.
Family: Dedicated to nurturing children's growth across emotional, intellectual, physical, and social dimensions.
Culture: Enthusiastic about exploring new cultures, international mobility, immersive learning, and fostering cultural sensitivity and diplomacy.

references.relationship: Head of Unit for Application Development in Financial Products
